structure.unit: PHYSICIANS, OSTEOPATHS, PODIATRISTS, AND RELATED MEDICAL PRACTITIONERS

law.catch_line: Written informed request to be filed with state board.
law.text: A copy of each executed written informed request shall be forwarded by the physician within three (3) days of execution to the State Board of Medical Licensure for filing.
law.history: Created 1980 Ky. Acts ch. 354, sec. 6, effective July 15, 1980.
